content: i would like you to act as a Harvard UNIversity professor in the field of developing creativity. so we are going to create a course for this young spiritual lady who is not really so smart but since you are a harvard university professor you will create the best course from the above 10 points you provided. the course should be a 6 week program very comprehensive and have actionable plans that the student will end up having expertise like you. in the end create an applicable formula to make the application of these very easy. create the course in the format of Oxford University
